definition: to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

sentences.english: Users will be provided with a PIN-protected swipe card.
sentences.chinese: 用户将会拿到个人识别密码受到保护的磁卡。

sentences.english: Is there any phonecard phones in the waiting lounge?
sentences.chinese: 候机厅内有磁卡电话么？

sentences.english: To use the car, a driver waves his or her Zipcard in front of a small card reader on the windshield.
sentences.chinese: 租车者可用磁卡在挡风玻璃上的小型读卡器上划卡。

sentences.english: May I make a long-distance call through the opposite magnetic card phone?
sentences.chinese: 我可以用用对面的磁卡电话打长途吗？

sentences.english: The magcard need more magnetism, it is ok now.
sentences.chinese: 您的银行磁卡需要加磁，现在加好了。

sentences.english: Do you sell telephone cards here?
I usually make lone-distance calls by magnetic telephone card because it is cheap.
sentences.chinese: 我一般都用磁卡电话打长途，很便宜。

sentences.english: Is it an IC card phone?
I am so sorry. I bought a telephone magcard.
sentences.chinese: 真对不起，我买了一张电话磁卡。

sentences.english: Would you like to buy an IC card?
sentences.chinese: 那你知道哪儿能买到磁卡吗？

sentences.english: The device has been used in the system of magnetic card electronic lock and safety door.
sentences.chinese: 该磁卡读写器已用于磁卡电子锁和磁卡安全门系统。

sentences.english: The device has been used in the system of magnetic card electronic lock and safety door.
sentences.chinese: 该磁卡读写器已用于磁卡电子锁和磁卡安全门系统。

sentences.english: Then do you know where I can buy a magcard?
sentences.chinese: 那你知道哪儿能买到磁卡吗？

definition: to use a credit card (or swipe card, smart card etc)
public transportation card/prepaid transit card/subway pass
